#summary The application programming interface for jasperoo.
#labels Featured,How-To
#sidebar TableOfContents

= Installation =
The url specified will always point to the latest release of jasperoo. To use an older version, download it from the [http://code.google.com/p/jasperoo/downloads/list downloads page].
{{{
osgi start --url http://s.digitalface.ca/jasperoo-latest
}}}

= Removal =
Prior to installing a new version of jasperoo, remove the old one.
{{{
addon remove --bundleSymbolicName ca.digitalface.jasperoo
}}}

= Methods =
 * [JasperooMethodsSetup setup]
 * [JasperooMethodsAdd add]
 * [JasperooMethodsAll all]
 * [JasperooMethodsExpand expand]
